statement.p: A subscription plan for a GPS tracking device costs 14.95 per month plus 0.10 per location ping (sent once every 10 minutes). What is the monthly charge if the device was used for 3 hours and 16 minutes?

solution.p: First, we need to know how many pings are sent in 3 hours and 16 minutes. This is a total of \displaystyle{3}\cdot{60}+{16}={196} minutes. This is \displaystyle\frac{{196}}{{10}}={19.6} 10 minute periods. Any time past the last 10 minute segment does not generate another ping so only 19 pings will be sent.
